channel.title: The Motzing Center
channel.description: Recent content on The Motzing Center

item.title: IRIS THEATRE RENTALS
item.description: Iris Theatre Rental Policy and Rates The Iris Theatre provides the opportunity for groups to rent the theatre for various different events. Upon approval from the Motzing Center Committee, groups are able to use the theatre space, show films along with other events upon request.

item.title: TICKETS
item.description: Children - $3.00 12 years old and under Adults - $5.00 13 years old and over The Iris Theatre strives to offer family friendly entertainment that is suitable for all ages.
